description: Momentary tactile pushbutton switch. Normally open (NO). Pins on same side are connected internally. When pressed, all 4 pins connect.

pins.label: Pin 1A
pins.description: A-side top pin. Always internally connected to PIN2A (same side). Connects to B-side when button is pressed.

pins.label: Pin 1B
pins.description: B-side top pin. Always internally connected to PIN2B (same side). Connects to A-side when button is pressed.

pins.label: Pin 2A
pins.description: A-side bottom pin. Always internally connected to PIN1A (same side). Connects to B-side when button is pressed.

pins.label: Pin 2B
pins.description: B-side bottom pin. Always internally connected to PIN1B (same side). Connects to A-side when button is pressed.
